title:
Is there a law the (NH) County can use to force HOA\'s to repair roadways in a timely manner? On (HOA owned) Lendire Road there are two large potholes where it intersects with Beacon Drive and Market Street. I advised the County through their website and was told the problem would be forwarded through their HOA Service Division, but that was more than one month ago, and the potholes have been widening all winter!



Thank you.
